title: Vistara cuts fares by up to 75% in 24-hour sale
content: The sale not only offers fares as low as Rs 1,599 all-in for short routes like Delhi-Lucknow, it also offers fares on other longer routes as well with fares on sectors such as Delhi-Hyderabad and Delhi-Ranchi starting Rs 2,199 and Delhi-Kolkata and Delhi-Mumbai from Rs 2,299, the release said.
